title: doc: sync/atomic: (*Value).Store says value of the Value is set to 'v' instead of 'x'.
body:
This is a minor typo at in package documentation at tip:
http://tip.golang.org/pkg/sync/atomic/#Value.Store

See:
"Store sets the value of the Value to v. All calls to Store for a given Value must
use values of the same concrete type. Store of an inconsistent type panics, as does
Store(nil)."

Expect:
"Store sets the value of the Value to x. All calls to Store for a given Value must
use values of the same concrete type. Store of an inconsistent type panics, as does
Store(nil)."
